$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/readme.text: !! How to use The Favorites plugin adds the {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image}} button to the tiddler view Toolbar and also the `Favorites` tab to the sidebar. The button becomes `red` when selected and then the tiddler appears in the list on the `Favorites` tab. The list can be sorted using drag and drop of items. A tiddler can be removed from the `Favorites` tab by either * opening it and clicking again on the {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image}} button. or * click on remove button in `Favorites` list on the sidebar The ''Favorites plugin'' contains three modes * ''flat mode'': one favorite list, no folder * ''structured mode'': use folder, search tool, export and delete tool * ''frozen list'': read only, simple table of content style Favorites plugin also supports folder operation, export and bulk operations. !! Tutorial * For detailed description and demo see: [[https://kookma.github.io/TW-Favorites/]] * For latest update and code see: [[https://github.com/kookma/TW-Favorites]]
